ls_-la.explanation: Lists all files (-a) in long format (-l)

ps_aux.explanation: Displays all running processes with user and system info

grep_-r,pattern,..explanation: Searches recursively (-r) for 'pattern' in current directory (.)

find_.,-name,*.log.explanation: Searches for files with .log extension in current directory

df_-h.explanation: Shows disk space usage in human-readable format (-h)
